description: This file contains CSS styles and variables used for theming and layout management in the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, sets text alignment, background color, and other styling.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for flexibility and responsiveness.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo component that handles animation and size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling to incorporate theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling theme between light and dark modes.
